attributes.action: Revision of policies / legislation of the CMS, to be fairer
attributes.additional_details:
Revision of the UNFAIR 25% rule for assessing liability to 10% from 25%

PRIORITY reply to CORRESPONDANCE from MP's to 14 days Mandatory

REDUCTION OF 20% Financial PENALTIES, which in Genuine cases causes financial hardship 

Sickness Team to be introduced to deal with CLIENTS who are on SICKNESS / LONGTERM. Support not IGNORANCE 

Introduction of Email facilities to enable clients to Communicate more effectively, 

Support of E-Commerce to save money, SECURE Emails to Clients
attributes.background:
NRP non residential parents are being treated unfairly by the system in the following areas

Assessment of the Gross pay when wageslips are provided as evidence of the NRP's gross figure instead Innacurate HMRC figures are used from previous years that are not reflective or accurate.

rejection.details:
Petitions need to call on the Government or Parliament to take a specific action.

We understand that you're concerned about child maintenance, but you've included a lot of information in your petition, so we're not sure exactly what you'd like the Government or Parliament to do. 

You could start a new petition explaining clearly what you would like the Government or Parliament to do.
